text: <@UDHT6N5SM> We use the following boilerplate to compile are SCSS, Preact / React or ES6: <https://github.com/teunrutten/HubSpot-boilerplate> (It is a little bit outdated and we have a private updated one, I will update this boilerplate asap).
<@UGDF9EBPW> Thanks for that. Sounds exciting. This is my first time hearing of Preact and using React in a HubSpot project is new

first time I have run into this, but is there a way to set the portal as a variable you are in? using the CTA embed code in the markup and trying to use the field in the the custom module, but I noticed it also has the portal id # in there and I am switching back and forth between a sandbox and prod portal
nice....thanks <@U38EZFVFE> I was hunting through the docs and didn't see it
